name: realtime-cursor-nextjs
title: Realtime Cursors (Next.js)
description: Display realtime cursor positions of other users in a room. Perfect for collaborative applications. Includes full Convex backend with presence tracking.
docs:
## Post-Install Setup

1. Run `npx convex dev` to start the Convex dev server.

2. Copy the deployment URL to your `.env.local` file as `NEXT_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL`.

3. The Convex schema and functions will be automatically deployed when you run `npx convex dev`.
